title: Crime Alert 01.10.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 01.10.19
description:
Sisters stab, then shoot mother leaving her to die outside the house. Shocking testimony of a soundproof "murder room" coming out in trial of drug kingpin El Chapo. Teen girl files an appeal for a shorter sentence after being convicted of stabbing classmate to please the fictional Slenderman. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
